Binary: postfix, postfix-ldap, postfix-lmdb, postfix-cdb, postfix-pcre, postfix-mongodb, postfix-mysql, postfix-pgsql, postfix-sqlite, postfix-doc
Build-Depends: debhelper-compat (= 13), default-libmysqlclient-dev, dpkg-dev (>= 1.16.1~), groff-base, html2text, libcdb-dev, libdb-dev (>= 4.6.19), libicu-dev, libldap-dev, liblmdb-dev, libmongoc-dev, libnsl-dev | libc6-dev (<< 2.37-15.1), libpcre2-dev, libpq-dev, libsasl2-dev, libsqlite3-dev, libssl-dev (>= 1.0.2), lsb-release, patch, pkgconf, po-debconf (>= 0.5.0), systemd-dev, txt2man
Package-List: postfix deb mail optional arch=any postfix-cdb deb mail optional arch=any postfix-doc deb doc optional arch=all postfix-ldap deb mail optional arch=any postfix-lmdb deb mail optional arch=any postfix-mongodb deb mail optional arch=any postfix-mysql deb mail optional arch=any postfix-pcre deb mail optional arch=any postfix-pgsql deb mail optional arch=any postfix-sqlite deb mail optional arch=any
Testsuite-Triggers: libsasl2-modules, lsb-release, procmail, python3, python3-pexpect, sasl2-bin
